songs.title: I’ll Be Home For Christmas (Duet)
songs.lyrics:
{Elvis}
I'll be home for Christmas
You can count on me
Please have snow and mistletoe
And presents for the tree

{Carrie Underwood}
Christmas Eve will find me
Where the love light leads
I'll be home for Christmas
If only in my dreams


Oooh oooh

....musical interlude..

{Elvis}
Christmas Eve will find me

{Carrie Underwood}
Where the love light leads

{Both}
I'll be home for Christmas
If only in my dreams

I'll be home for Christmas
